msg.msgText: High-Availability is disabled on the Primary node with cluster enabled.

msgExplanation.p: Standby node is in Maintenance mode because High-Availability is disabled on the Primary node with cluster enabled.

msgUserResponse.p: If this server is intended to be a member of the cluster, reconfigure cluster membership in server configuration and restart the server in Production mode. If this server is not intended to be a member of a cluster, reset configuration to set the server in pristine state.
